ProjectTitle: Model-informed precision dosing of tacrolimus in solid organ transplant recipients
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/04/2024
Data: please list all your different datasets in different rows and give each dataset a name and description 
Ethics/Personal data: You list several ethical approval numbers in data reuse so there are ethical issues;  but answer no to next question please correct this, is the processing of personal data for this study included in these approvals?
Metadata: which relevant international standard(s) in biomedical science will you use? for more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation: note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation, https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing: if there are no factors restricting sharing why do you have to have to use restricted access? Is privacy a factor?
label: not good
